Hey buddy! I'm Sana Ajani.

I am a 4th year undergrad student at Georgia Tech majoring in Computer Science, specializing in the Modeling & Simulation and Information Internetworks concentrations. I'm also pursuing a minor in Business.

I've been involved with leading TEDx events at my school and teaching AP Computer Science to high school girls.

Last summer, I interned at Microsoft as an Explorer Intern and in the spring, I interned at CNN as a front-end developer. This summer, I'll be interning at American Express in NYC.

For more info, check out some of my projects and my blog! You can also get a copy of my resume.

Want to chat? Feel free to drop me a line at @sana_ajani or by email.
